Cherrycake\LoginUser::loadFromStringField

loadFromStringField

Interfaced method to be implemented by the App class that represents a user when interacting with the Login module. Loads a user with the given $userName. $userName is whatever is required to the user as username; normally, an email or a username.

    Signature

    public function loadFromStringField(string $userName )

    Parameters

    $userName — string
    The username of the user to load. Usually, an email or a username.

    Returns

    boolean
    True if the user could be loaded ok, or false if the load failed, or the user does not exists.
